body: @bradfitz This is typically linux-specific code, such as some of the libraries used by docker (example: libcontainer) or code where linux implementation is in a different file then windows one (fsnotify). Both examples have now fixes commited, but I expect that more are being created as we talk. Developers are not aware that bunch of syscalls go provides are actually deprecated ones, because they work just fine on amd64. My faith that people who use the syscall package know what they are doing is not very strong...
